text: Tournado is the eighth live album by Tangerine Dream and their fifty-sixth overall. It is the first live album released by the group to feature no new compositions. ==Reception== Dave Connolly of AllMusic gave the album four out of five stars, stating that the album "might be the best place to start" for those interested in works produced by Tangerine Dream in the 1990s. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== ; Tangerine Dream * Edgar Froese - keyboards * Jerome Froese - keyboards * Zlatko Perica - electric guitar ;Guest musicians * Emil Hachfeld - electronic drums ==References== Category:1997 live albums Category:Tangerine Dream live albums
title: Tournado (Tangerine Dream album)
